message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a good amount now than risk losing out later due to inflation.
Considering inflation, 45 is a good amount for you. I'll take 55. It's better for both of us to settle now.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Another round of inflation will only hurt us both.
Given the increasing impact of inflation on your share, 42 is a generous offer. I'll take 58. It's wise for you to accept now.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $48, but I won't accept anything less.  It's time to settle this before inflation eats away at the value even more.
Considering the significant impact of inflation on your share, 40 is a fair offer now. I'll take 60. It's in your best interest to accept before it devalues further.
